projects: [{"title":"Ganga River Basin Management Plan","start_date":"2011","end_date":"2012","description":"An initiative by consortium of PAN IITs and the Ministry of Environment and Forests, Government of India || Guide - Professor D.J. Sen, Department of Civil Engineering, IIT Kharagpur•In depth analysis of Ganga River Basin of West Bengal by simulating surface discharge using SWAT incorporating weather data collected by NASA and other institutions•Locating areas with low ground water levels, surface runoff and high pollution levels and preparing plan to rectify the problem•Instrumental in serving India and Bangladesh with adequate amount of healthy water for future"},{}]
